tips.text: Added new "Download Date" column to the Mods tab.
The plugin list will now automatically synchronize with external changes (manual or made by other tools).
Added Plugins Counter feedback to the bottom bar.

Added a new sorting functionality with the "Auto Plugin Sorting" button, when clicked it will automatically sort your plugins \\ (LOOT is not required to be installed, an active internet connection is required to download the latest masterlist).
Added "Error/Warning" column to the Mod Activation Queue monitor, in case of issues with the current operation you can click the icon in it to check the details.
NMM will keep track of options selected in scripted installers (this info will be used in the profile build).
Added Mod Activation Queue feedback to the bottom bar.
The Mod Activation Queue will now automatically focus on the currently active element.
The progress meter has been added.
A "Restore backup" button has been added to this version of NMM that will allow you to revert future versions of NMM back to this version (0.53.0) should anything go wrong.
A new "Mod Activation Queue" window has been added. You can now queue multiple mods to install one after another rather than waiting to install one mod at a time.
Click here to remove a single Queued or Completed mod activation.
Click here to remove all the Queued activations from the list.
Click here to purge all the Completed activations.
This version fully supports the new CDN download system.
Click here to check the latest version tips.
This version supports the new Abstain endorsement state (click once to Endorse and click again to Abstain).
Fixed an issue with the XML script compiler preventing scripts to properly compile for plugin-less games.
